<!--

**Description**

<!--
Briefly describe the problem you are having in a few paragraphs.
-->

FUSE-Overlayfs snapshotter intermittently fails with "wait: no child processes"

```console
ctr: failed to mount rootfs component &{fuse3.fuse-overlayfs overlay [workdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/work upperdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/fs lowerdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/1/fs writeback=0]}: mount helper [mount.fuse3 [overlay /run/containerd/io.containerd.runtime.v2.task/default/test/rootfs -o workdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/work -o upperdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/fs -o lowerdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/1/fs -o writeback=0 -t fuse-overlayfs]] failed: "": wait: no child processes: unknown
```


**Steps to reproduce the issue:**
* Install [fuse-overlayfs](https://github.com/containers/fuse-overlayfs) v1.1.2
* Install AkihiroSuda/containerd-fuse-overlayfs@d86b677ea0f243cb451939e743dfc5815e8cb65c
* Install containerd @ 4bec2dbd4f23be6d3bc034330df72e45eedc1838
* Set up `/etc/containerd/config.toml`
```toml
[proxy_plugins]
  [proxy_plugins."fuse-overlayfs"]
    type = "snapshot"
    address = "/run/containerd/fuse-overlayfs.sock"
```
* Start the daemons
```console
$ sudo containerd
$ sudo containerd-fuse-overlayfs-grpc /run/containerd/fuse-overlayfs.sock /tmp/foo
```
* Run some container
```console
$ sudo ctr images pull  --snapshotter=fuse-overlayfs docker.io/library/alpine:latest
$ sudo ctr run -t --rm  --snapshotter=fuse-overlayfs docker.io/library/alpine:latest test echo hi
```

**Describe the results you received:**

Amongst 100 executions, 93 succeed, 7 fail

```console
ctr: failed to mount rootfs component &{fuse3.fuse-overlayfs overlay [workdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/work upperdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/fs lowerdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/1/fs writeback=0]}: mount helper [mount.fuse3 [overlay /run/containerd/io.containerd.runtime.v2.task/default/test/rootfs -o workdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/work -o upperdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/108/fs -o lowerdir=/tmp/foo/snapshots/1/fs -o writeback=0 -t fuse-overlayfs]] failed: "": wait: no child processes: unknown
```


**Describe the results you expected:**
100% succeed


**Output of `containerd --version`:**

```
containerd github.com/containerd/containerd v1.4.0-beta.2-2-g4bec2dbd 4bec2dbd4f23be6d3bc034330df72e45eedc1838
```
title: intermittent failure with FUSE mount helper: "wait: no child processes"
